channel.title: Big Data on Grid Side
channel.description: Recent content in Big Data on Grid Side

item.title: Airline On-time Performance Big Data Analytic System Development
item.description:
● A big data analytics platform was implemented with Hadoop and HBase (Deployed on Amazon AWS).

● Analyzed Airline On-time performance data from 1987 to 2008 with hundred millions of records.

● Set up development environment in EC2: Java Environment setup, Hadoop, HBase, Pig, Apache Phoenix, Hive, Spark, Tomcat installation and configuration.

● Developed 10+ MapReduce jobs, several Pig UDF in Java and 10+ Pig scripts for data cleansing and preprocessing, and stored refined data to HBase.

● Implemented logistic regression algorithm using Spark ML-Lib to predict airline delays.

● Technologies used: Hadoop, HBase, Hive, Apache Phoenix, Pig were used at back-end. D3.js, morris.js, crossfilter.js, and Bootstrap framework were used at front-end.

@Github: https://github.com/sleephu/Airline-ontime-performance-Analytics-BigData

item.title: Climate Change Big Data Analytic System Development
item.description:
● A big data analytics platform was implemented with Spark and Cassandra (Deployed on Amazon AWS).

● Analyzed GSOD Climate data from 1921 - 2013, (Raw data size around 21 GB).

● Parsed data with Python and developed apps in Java for data cleansing and preprocessing, and loaded into Cassandra.

● Implemented ARIMA algorithms with MATLAB ARIMA tool jar package to build prediction model for future climate.

● Implemented k-means algorithms on Apache Spark cluster which provides real-time analytics capabilities to build clustering model to find areas with similar climate condition.

● Built a responsive UI using Spring framework for interactive analysis.

● Technologies used: Spark, Cassandra, Spring framework were used at back-end, Google Chart and Bootstrap framework were used at front-end.
